sn11.1:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn11.1:2.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo suviram devaputtam amantesi:
sn11.1:2.5: ‘Evam, bhaddantava’ti kho, bhikkhave, suviro devaputto sakkassa devanamindassa patissutva pamadam apadesi.
sn11.1:2.6: Dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo suviram devaputtam amantesi:
sn11.1:2.9: ‘Evam, bhaddantava’ti kho, bhikkhave, suviro devaputto sakkassa devanamindassa patissutva dutiyampi pamadam apadesi.
sn11.1:2.10: Tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo suviram devaputtam amantesi:
sn11.1:2.13: ‘Evam, bhaddantava’ti kho, bhikkhave, suviro devaputto sakkassa devanamindassa patissutva tatiyampi pamadam apadesi.
sn11.1:2.14: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo suviram devaputtam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn11.1:8.1: So hi nama, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo sakam punnaphalam upajivamano devanam tavatimsanam issariyadhipaccam rajjam karento utthanaviriyassa vannavadi bhavissati.
sn11.1:8.2: Idha kho tam, bhikkhave, sobhetha, yam tumhe evam svakkhate dhammavinaye pabbajita samana utthaheyyatha ghateyyatha vayameyyatha appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya, asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya”ti.
